name: Cube Escape (Stephan Wetzel)
description:
Dodge 500 falling cubes to win!

This is my first project using pure Javascript and WebGL. I wanted to find out how this works in the browser and therefore I converted some parts of my C++ game engine.

Controls:
Left- and Right-Arrow to move
Up-Arrow to jump

Credits:
Sound effects taken from Blendwave.net
